title: Heavy input delay
body: Hey, I've been having the same issue every single game. When I click on Q W E R it register 2 sec later, or when I clicked on my mouse, it won't move till 2 sec later. Any help would be appreciate, sorry about my English. One more thing, this issue affecting my gameplay on thresh. plz help!

replies.body: It sounds like you could be experiencing an unstable connection problem like packet loss, which can result in input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an analysis of your specific situation.  The results will give us some more info on what's happening, as well as some troubleshooting steps.  Let me know what you find!
